org.ndnx.ndn.io
Class NDNDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  org.ndnx.ndn.io.NDNDescriptor

public class NDNDescriptor
extends Object

A file descriptor-style wrapper around NDNVersionedInputStream and NDNVersionedOutputStream.

Constructor Detail

NDNDescriptor

public NDNDescriptor(ContentName name,
                     PublisherPublicKeyDigest publisher,
                     NDNHandle handle,
                     boolean openForWriting)
              throws IOException
Open a new descriptor for reading or writing (but not both).

Parameters:
name - see NDNVersionedInputStream for specification
publisher - see NDNVersionedInputStream for specification
handle - see NDNVersionedInputStream for specification
openForWriting - if true, open an output stream. Otherwise open an input stream.
Throws:
IOException

available

public int available()
              throws IOException
Returns:
If open for reading, returns result of NDNInputStream#available(), otherwise returns 0.
Throws:
IOException

openForReading

public boolean openForReading()
Returns:
true if opened for reading

openForWriting

public boolean openForWriting()
Returns:
true if opened for writing
